node.name: Revamping calendar designs to streamline complex surgery scheduling
node.companyDescription: LeanTaaS offers B2B software solutions that optimize healthcare operations. Its scheduling platform allows clinics and hospitals to coordinate surgeries.
node.description: reducing training effort and making scheduling easier
node.myRole: I led end-to-end design and research of the surgery scheduling tool and collaborated with product, engineering, and customer success teams to strategize releases.
node.results: Users completed their tasks 30% faster; support tickets and in-person training decreased by 50%.

node.name: Creating data visualization for analytics dashboard to optimize OR utilization
node.companyDescription: LeanTaaS offers B2B software solutions that optimize healthcare operations. Its analytics platform provides insights for hospital management teams to maximize operating room (OR) utilization.
node.description: reducing training effort and making scheduling easier
node.myRole: I worked with the product manager and data analyst team to define scope and gather data. I led the design and user testing sessions and later collaborated with engineers through implementation.
node.results: Over 70% of analytics users actively use this dashboard every month.

node.name: Launching comments and document upload features from 0-1
node.companyDescription: LeanTaaS offers software solutions that help optimize healthcare operation, ranging from analytics dashboard, surgery scheduling, to staff management tools.
node.description: Designing and researching comments & document upload features to elevate the functionalities of surgery scheduling software.
node.myRole: I led end-to-end design and research of the scheduling tool and worked with PMs & engineers to launch various features, including Comments & Document Upload.
node.results: The feature adoption increased by about 175%. The number of customers who signed contract to adopt this feature went up from 9 to 25.

node.name: Designing a new investment tool that increased company AUM by $200M
node.companyDescription: Jitta Wealth is a fintech startup providing automated investment services to make investment more accessible and easier for individuals.
node.myRole: I worked directly with the CEO and a cross-functional team to define product requirements, design mobile interfaces & experiences, and hand off the design to the engineering team.
node.results: The company's total assets under management (AUM) went up over 60% within the first 3 months after the product launched.

node.name: Researching and designing custom form builder for construction professionals
node.companyDescription: PlanGrid provides cloud-based solutions to increase productivity in the construnction industry. It became a part of Autodesk Construction Cloud after the acquisition in 2018.
node.description: adding flexibility to form creation process
node.myRole: I was a product design intern on Field Reports, a tool for users to create, submit, and review construction reports. I worked with a PM and researchers to examine form creation process and designed a custom form builder feature.
node.results: My research and design initiatives provided a foundation for the team to successfully launch the feature in early 2020.

node.name: Built a tool for monitoring and managing users accounts in construction projects
node.companyDescription: PlanGrid offers construction productivity software for field workers to store, view, and share blueprints. The software also enables stakeholders to work together throughout the project life cycle.
node.description: providing more visibility and control for IT admins
node.myRole: I worked with a PM to gather requirements, defined users flow, and designed the interfaces. I also ran a usability inspection to test each variation of my design.
node.results: High-fidelity wireframes ready for developers to implement.

node.name: Crafted a comic-themed application portal for Canada’s largest hackathon
node.companyDescription: Hack the North is Canada’s biggest hackathon held annually at the University of Waterloo. Every year, over 1,000 students from around the world spend 36 hours to collaboratively design and build projects of their choice.
node.description: attracting 7,000+ applicants and creating an unforgettable experience
node.myRole: I worked with a graphic designer, a team of 4 developers, and an application lead to design the application portal for students to apply to the event.
node.results: A working responsive application portal used by over 7000+ applicants around the world to apply for Canada's biggest hackathon.
